14.heading: Leather Clothing.
14.title: "Trapped in IMP TV"
14.author: writer, Cary Bates ; penciller, Curt Swan ; inker, Dave Hunt ; colorist, Gene D'Angelo ; letterer, Gaspar ; editor, Julius Schwartz
notes: Summary (by Mary Walker): Superman is suddenly dealing with improbable occurrences (being impaled by the sound effects of a leather clad punkish Jimmy). Mr. Mxyzptlk is also soon facing some weird effects (Lana Lang into S&M and treating him like a dog with collar and leash and forcing him head-first into a dog-food dish). Mxyzpltk's cousin Nzykmulk is behind it. The cousin confronts Mxyzpltk and describes how he intends to create a video scenario of the death of both his cousin and Superman, and Superman takes him out.

132.heading: Leaving.
132.title: "Now- It's Good- I Wish I Hadn't Let Her Go"
132.author: Geo
notes: Summary: The cook is making corned beef and cabbage, and Jiggs wants to know why he can't have some. He leaves for the old neighborhood while Maggie fires the cook.

133.heading: Leaving.
133.title: "Once In A While Couldn't We Just Have Some Pasta?"
133.author: Larson.
notes: Situation: A cave man, leaving for the hunt, complains to his wife.

134.heading: Leaving.
134.title: "Same to You, Buddy!"
134.author: Young and LeBrun.
notes: Summary: A mind-reader comes to Dagwood's door, and leaves without making a sale.

138.heading: Leaving.

139.heading: Leaving.
139.title: "That Should Distract Him"
139.author: by Lynn Johnston.
139.series: For Better or For Worse, Sept. 24, 1998

140.heading: Leaving.
140.title: "There is No Gift as Friendly as a Book!"
140.author: Hanan.
notes: Summary: Louie leaves the house with a vase bouncing off his head, and returns to a smoke-filled kitchen with a gift from the bookstore. He leaves the house again with a cookbook bouncing off his head.

141.heading: Leaving.

141.author: Stephan Pastis.
notes: Summary: Pig thinks Rat said "tired of leaving."

142.heading: Leaving.
142.title: "To the Brave"

144.heading: Leaving.
144.title: "We Can't Leave Now, Luke. She's Too Upset"

145.heading: Leaving.
145.title: "We Gotta Be Goin'"

146.heading: Leaving.

149.heading: Leaving.

notes: Summary: Mr. Blink leaves Joel and Rufus in a huff, but forgets his camera.

150.title: "Leaving California"
150.author: by Mike Peters.

151.heading: Leaving Early.
151.title: "Ben Makes an Early Exit from the Charterstone Pool Party"

152.title: "He Leaves Early on Friday"

156.heading: Leaving for Golf.

156.author: Kelso & Kemp.
